ratings.comment: It's such an irony to see a person who studies justice indeed does not defend justice in reality.

Professor Haberkorn is one of the kindest teachers I have ever had, and she is very understanding and always willing to listen. Attendance in lecture is extra credit, and she always tries to hear opinions from the class to make the lectures more intriguing. Great class to take if you want a low-stress, easy, and interesting humanities course!
Attendance is extra credit, readings I only scanned over, super understanding and sweet professor

I graduated last year, and I think she was my favorite professor I had for my entire college experience. She is very passionate and knowledgeable and cares about the perspectives of all in the class. I definitely recommend taking one of her classes!

Her SE Asian Lit class was amazing. Each reading was interesting and related to the class. The class itself only had three papers and no exams. I would highly recommend Professor Haberkorn as she is passionate about teaching. I want to take more classes with her!
Super sweet and understanding and genuinely loves the topic she teaches. Attendance is extra credit

Tyrell inspires me to write and even though the reading is a lot, I enjoy the discussions so much that I am motivated to read. Tyrell encourages creativity and is a caring person who makes a 2.5 hour class go by quickly!

I took her class on Cambodian Genocide. She liked to encourage us to talk in class but the class was seven people and it was hard to get them to talk. She's super nice and gave A's on all the assignments.
an amazing professor. her S.E Asian lit class was quite inspiring. I hope to take her other courses.
